body_html:
This normally results in a directory containing subdirs for include and lib so a single path serves to locate both the library and header files.

@prb12: that's not the case with deb packages as @gunan mentioned.

@gunan: I'm not sure what your question is. But the path /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/include/cudnn.h doesn't make sense. There is probably a problem when configuring TensorFlow.
